CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI and INV enter room . CHI is holding bottle
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box and then watches INV leave
CHI looks towards jack+in+the+box then turns toward MOT
MOT gets up from chair and picks up jack+in+the+box
CHI turns towards MOT and begins to reach for jack+in+the+box
MOT watches CHI while she holds the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes hands off of jack+in+the+box
MOT looks up at the wall then down at CHI
MOT turns around and looks at jack+in+the+box again to get CHI's attention back to playing
CHI looks back at jack+in+the+box and turns crank
CHI points at the computer out of camera view
MOT turns to look where CHI is pointing
MOT is puts jack+in+the+box back in box and puts it on the desk
CHI starts to pull chair from table
CHI leans on the table and pushes himself into the chair
MOT takes jack+in+the+box off of desk
CHI looks up at the wall
CHI points towards wall . CHI looks back to MOT
<bef> CHI begins turning handle of jack+in+the+box . CHI stops turning handle
CHI points to car on floor
CHI bends down to pick up ball
stress is on first syllable only
MOT looks at football on floor
MOT picks up football from floor
MOT tosses ball on floor and offers jack+in+the+box to CHI
CHI looks up at the wall
CHI reaches for jack+in+the+box in MOT's lap
MOT looks up at the wall as she holds the jack+in+the+box
CHI points to what may be an animal painted on jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI stops turning the handle . CHI walks towards door
CHI moves back towards jack+in+the+box which MOT is still holding
CHI gestures with finger toward door
MOT turns jack+in+the+box towards her to look at the clown
CHI is facing away from camera
CHI points to the nose of the clown
CHI touches computer behind the table
MOT grabs CHI's hand and pulls him away
CHI walks around table with MOT
CHI points at toy on floor
CHI turns around and looks at book
INV opens door and walks in
INV leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 14:13:52
INV explains Forbidden Object task as she clears table of toys from Small Scale Activity . MOT and CHI sit side by side at the table .
INV takes the object out of the drawer and sets it on table
MOT leans towards object and points indicating no
CHI knocks the object over with his other hand
INV picks up the toys from Small Scale as CHI starts to whine .
INV explains that MOT and CHI have ten minutes to work with Parent Child Interaction Boxes
MOT bounces the ball on the floor
MOT kneels down and puts ball on floor
CHI holds ball over his head
CHI starts to walk towards observation room wall
CHI turns toward MOT to catch ball
CHI catches ball and throws it up in the air
MOT tosses ball up with palm of hand
CHI walks to small chair at table
CHI points to camera in passing
CHI begins to play with seat belt on small chair
CHI plays with the strap on the chair and not with MOT
CHI leans over chair still holding seat belt
MOT takes towel out of box
MOT puts towel on CHI's head
CHI stands up and tries to take towel off head
CHI removes towel from head and begins playing with seat belt again
MOT puts towel on CHI's head again
MOT pushes chair away from CHI
MOT tries to put towel on CHI's head
CHI puts hands on head to keep towel off
CHI turns towards door and desk
MOT folds towel and puts it back in box
MOT gets up from floor to get box from desk
MOT looks up at CHI briefly
CHI is mostly obscured by table
CHI reaches for something in the box
MOT reaches into box for more paper and hands it to CHI
CHI turns around and starts to draw on the floor
CHI turns back to draw on paper
CHI holds crayon in his hand and holds arm up in air
MOT moves head slightly to indicate no
MOT bends towards paper and points
CHI reaches over to draw on rug
CHI is partially obscured by table
MOT takes crayon from CHI . MOT wipes crayon from CHI's mouth
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
<$=2> MOT gathers up paper and crayon to put back in box
MOT gets up to get last box from desk
MOT puts the box on the floor in front of CHI
MOT lifts cover off of box
throughout the whole activity full view of MOT and CHI is blocked by the table
MOT points to picture in book
MOT points to picture in book
MOT points to picture in book
MOT points to picture in book
MOT brushes CHI's hair with her hand
MOT leans over to open book
CHI picks up cover of box
CHI hands the cover of the book to MOT
MOT puts cover back on box
MOT gets up from floor to put box on desk
<$=1> CHI gets up and walks towards door
MOT sits down in chair by door
CHI is out of camera view
<$=2> MOT wipes crayon off of CHI's teeth
CHI stands close to the door
CHI backs away from the door
